attributes.action: Create a driving re-test every 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make everyone who has a driving licence take a retest or refresher test every 10 years (or 5 years), this will make every one who does drive a better driver as they will need to be on their toes with regards to the traffic rules and regulations. It could be done so that you have 2 chances to pass.
It will also get bad drivers off the roads. All proceeds to go into the running of these tests, cleaner engergy, and the roads themselves.
